author: bentmann
msg: [MNG-2693] Error executing post-site: java.util.MissingResourceException: Can't find bundle for base name site-plugin, locale en

author: amassari
msg: When matching an XPath expression, don't accept a node only if it's the first branch of an union that matches. The XPath parser takes care of removing identical branches (XERCESC-809)

author: fmeschbe
msg: JCRSITE-19 Remove commons/jcr-api tree again (Day Software will provide bundled JCR 1.0 API)

author: gbrown
msg: Minor fix to ListButtonSkin and CalendarButtonSkin (ensure that selection is set after requesting focus to button, in case listeners want to set focus based on selection change event); additional updates to file browser UI.
